column3: Verify login with valid mobile number and correct OTP
column4: User has a registered mobile number and can receive OTP
column5:
1. Open Flipkart
2. Click Login
3. Enter valid mobile number
4. Request OTP
5. Enter correct OTP
6. Click Login
column7: User logs in successfully and is redirected to homepage
column8: User logs in successfully and is redirected to homepage

column3: Verify login fails with invalid mobile number
column5:
1. Open Flipkart
2. Click Login
3. Enter invalid number
4. Click Request OTP
column7: System shows an error; OTP is not sent
column8: System shows error; please enter valid emailID or valid mobile number

column3: Validate search with valid product name (Samsung S24)
column5:
1. Open Flipkart
2. Click Search
3. Type "Samsung S24"
4. Press Enter
column7: Relevant Samsung S24 products appear in results
column8: Samsung S24 products appear in results

column3: Verify adding a valid product to cart
column5:
1. Search for Samsung S24
2. Open any product
3. Click Add to Cart
4. Open Cart page
column7: Product is added to cart with correct details

column3: Validate price updates when quantity changes
column4: At least one product exists in cart
column5:
1. Open Cart page
2. Increase quantity from 1 → 2
3. Verify price update
4. Decrease quantity to 1
